outcome: A mysterious group exploits system glitches to disrupt BCI and influences public sentiment.

events.description: A shadowy group called "The Architects" leaves cryptic messages within BCI subsystems, hinting at systemic flaws.
Public sentiment shifts as anonymous footage of BCI failures circulates, leading to rising distrust.
Key systems are sabotaged from within, disrupting daily life and fueling anti-BCI sentiment.
Emergency Council meeting convenes to address growing concerns but ends without concrete direction.
